summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for the Butterfly Trust account held at Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas for the month of July 2017. It outlines the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest calculations.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust account had a beginning balance of $52.99 and an ending balance of $52.99 for July 2017.
The account had deposits and withdrawals totaling $50.00 each.
Service charges and fees for the account were $50.00 during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
Interest earned on the account for the period was $0.00.
